text: The Spectre of the Bride (Spanish:El espectro de la novia) is a 1943 Mexican mystery film directed by René Cardona and starring David T. Bamberg, Narciso Busquets and Mimí Derba.Cotter p.16 ==Cast== * Julio Ahuet * David T. Bamberg as Fu Manchu * Narciso Busquets as Juanito * Mimí Derba * Cuquita Escobar * Josefina Escobedo * Miguel Ángel Ferriz * Manuel Medel as Satanás * José Pidal * Ángel T. Sala * Agustín Sen * Hernán Vera == References == == Bibliography == * Cotter, Bob. The Mexican Masked Wrestler and Monster Filmography. McFarland & Company, 2005. == External links == * Category:1943 films Category:1943 mystery films Category:Mexican mystery films Category:Mexican films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Films directed by René Cardona Category:Mexican black-and-white films
title: The Spectre of the Bride
